title: 4-O-Demethylbarbatic acid has a novel therapeutic impact on the progression of EGFR-driven lung adenocarcinoma.
abstract: 4-O-Demethylbarbatic acid (4O-DBA), a secondary metabolite derived from lichen species, has shown inhibitory activity of epstein-barr virus (EBV), indicating its potential in cancer prevention or treatment. However, the mechanisms underlying its anti-cancer effects, particularly in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), remain unclear.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
